CustomField.description: This field is automatically populated when a percentage value is entered into the Rate Discount field on Loan, and represents the discounted interest rate a customer will receive for their loan. This field is calculated as the loan’s Interest Rate minus the Rate Discount. By default, this field is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field automatically calculates a customer’s discounted interest rate for a loan.
CustomField.label: Preferred Rate
